name: Donnie Yen
comment: The impression is really amazing, I didn't expect to be in this position. Can See really clear, no blurry, no complaints, in my eyes. There are no side effects that I feel. There's no need to be afraid of LASIK, and believe me, EyePlus care center is really good.

name: John Doe
comment: The progress that I feel is very good, many of my colleagues and students ask where I am getting treatment, because they are amazed by the progress of the results of my treatment. Thank you EyePLus Care, for the quality service I have received!

name: Mike Sugar
comment: The EyePlus Care service is very good and satisfying. the time to consult a doctor is unlimited. The doctor provides very clear and detailed information so that we become aware of the cause of the disease, treatment and also to prevent it from recurring.
